data.text: @VanceSB your family is in my prayer, hope you can heal from this soon❤️

@VanceSB I went through something similar the year prior; it hurts for a long time and it's not something you fully recover from, but all the pain ends somewhere, and you'll be happy you're around when it does. If you ever need to vent, i know we're almost strangers but dms are open.
@VanceSB So sorry to hear this my man. If there is anything I can do for you please reach out!
@VanceSB Hoping things get better for you man, much love 🤍

@VanceSB You're a strong man Vance. Your ability to push through strife and work hard is something I admire. It aint gonna be easy and loss is difficult, but dammit bro I know you'll come out of this stronger. Love you a ton. If you ever want to talk or grab a bite to eat I'm 100% down.
@VanceSB My condolences, praying for you and your family
@VanceSB Im sorry man, sending you good vibes until things get better
@VanceSB I'm so sorry man, let me know if you need anything
@VanceSB Love to you brother. Thank you for everything you do for the scene
